021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.actions.EconomyResponse;
023
024/**
025 * Contains some default responses that relate to {@link Account account} operations.
026 *
027 * @author creatorfromhell
028 * @see Account
029 * @since 0.1.2.0
030 */
031public enum AccountResponse implements EconomyResponse {
032
033  /**
034   * The action was successfully completed, and during it an account was created.
035   *
036   * @since 0.1.2.0
037   */
038  CREATED {
039    @Override
040    public boolean success() {
041
042      return true;
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public String response() {
047
048      return "Messages.Admin.Created";
049    }
050  },
051
052  /**
053   * The action failed, and during it an account was not created.
054   *
055   * @since 0.1.2.0
056   */
057  CREATION_FAILED {
058    @Override
059    public boolean success() {
060
061      return false;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public String response() {
066
067      return "Messages.Admin.CreationFailed";
068    }
069  },
070
071  /**
072   * The action failed, and during it an account was not created. This is because a plugin has
073   * blocked the account creation.
074   *
075   * @since 0.1.2.0
076   */
077  CREATION_FAILED_PLUGIN {
078    @Override
079    public boolean success() {
080
081      return false;
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public String response() {
086
087      return "Messages.Admin.CreationFailed";
088    }
089  },
090
091  /**
092   * The account that was attempted to be created already exists.
093   *
094   * @since 0.1.2.0
095   */
096  ALREADY_EXISTS {
097    @Override
098    public boolean success() {
099
100      return false;
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public String response() {
105
106      return "Messages.Admin.Exists";
107    }
108  },
109
110  /**
111   * The account specified during a call doesn't exist.
112   *
113   * @since 0.1.2.0
114   */
115  DELETED {
116    @Override
117    public boolean success() {
118
119      return true;
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public String response() {
124
125      return "Messages.Admin.Deleted";
126    }
127  },
128
129  /**
130   * The account specified during a call doesn't exist.
131   *
132   * @since 0.1.2.0
133   */
134  DOESNT_EXIST {
135    @Override
136    public boolean success() {
137
138      return false;
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public String response() {
143
144      return "Messages.Account.NoSuch";
145    }
146  },
147
148}
